title: Resolve a Missing Package
description: A customer calls because their online order was marked as 'Delivered' by the carrier, but they never received it.

tasks.description: Look up the customer's order and verify the tracking information shows it as delivered.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent confirms the carrier's delivery scan.

tasks.description: Advise the customer to check around their property and with neighbors, and to wait one more business day in case of a premature scan.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent provides standard first-step troubleshooting.

tasks.description: If the package still doesn't arrive, initiate a claim with the shipping carrier and send a replacement order to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent resolves the customer's issue while also attempting to recover the cost from the carrier.
